952900.name: Tomoyo After - CLANNAD/Tomoyo After Piano Arrange Album "Piano no Mori"
952900.description:
The piano arrangement album of CLANNAD and Tomoyo After is now available on Steam!
With 11 tracks in both FLAC and MP3 formats, download the CLANNAD/Tomoyo After Piano Arrangement Album "Piano no Mori" now and enjoy your favorite tracks from both games in beautiful piano rendition.

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the 2005 album CLANNAD/Tomoyo After Piano Arrange Album "Piano no Mori" (KLSA-0021) and features 10 tracks.

CLANNAD/Tomoyo After Piano Arrange Album "Piano no Mori" Track list

1. To the Same heights

2. Mag Mell
3. White Clovers
4. Tiny Palms
5. "Two Shadows"
6. dear old home
7. rivulet
8. worth living
9. harmony with sorrow
10. love song
